title: Fenzo
subtitle: eCommerce
description: Fenzo is an e-commerce website focused on wedding decorations and rentals. Developed using Next.js & TailwindCSS.

title: Memorization Association
subtitle: LMS
description: Memorization Association is a website where users can submit exams with the ability to take breaks, and keep updated with company news and photo gallery. The website is Multilingual (English, Arabic), It is built using React.js and MUI.

title: Vela
subtitle: Chat App
description: Vela is a private realtime chat application built for companies using React.js, MUI and Pusher.js, featuring to-do lists, event management, and video/voice calling. The app is multilanguage and has both dark and light mode.

title: Fulink
subtitle: mini ERP
description: Fulink is a mini ERP system which is built using React.js and MUI, based on the (Fuse React Template) to ensure a scalable and professional structure. Implemented a role- and permission-based access system (SuperAdmin, Admins, Company Users) and integrated key third-party libraries such as Google Maps, Zod, and others.

title: Eram Games
subtitle: Landing Page
description: This is a landing page for a games production company called Eram Games. The website is developed using HTML and TailwindCSS.
